LanguageData.EdB.ModOrder.NoModWarning: You must have at least one mod active. If you only have one mod active, it must be the Core mod or a mod that is meant to replace the Core mod.\n\nIf you choose to continue, the Core mod will be activated for you.
LanguageData.EdB.ModOrder.CoreModOrderWarning: Usually, the Core mod should be first in the list of active mods so that subsequent mods can override its base definitions.\n\nAre you sure that you want to move the Core mod from the first position?
LanguageData.Fluffy.VersionChecking.NotImplemented: The author has not implemented version checking. Please tell them how easy this is!
LanguageData.Fluffy.VersionChecking.Error: One or more errors occured while trying to determine versions:\n\n{0}
